alert.note: Alert for Cocke Smoky Mountains; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 1:35PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN COCKE AND SEVIER COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sevierville to 9 miles east of Pigeon Forge to near Newport. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Newport, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Smoky Mountains-Clingmans Dome, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Pittman Center, Bird Crossing, and Fairgarden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cocke Smoky Mountains; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke; Sevier Smoky Mountains
